[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/playwright-browser-tunnel](./playwright-browser-tunnel.md) &gt; [LaunchOptionsValidator](./playwright-browser-tunnel.launchoptionsvalidator.md)

## LaunchOptionsValidator class

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Validates Playwright launch options against security allowlists. Provides utilities for managing client-side allowlist configuration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class LaunchOptionsValidator 
```

Method


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

[addToAllowlistAsync(option)](./playwright-browser-tunnel.launchoptionsvalidator.addtoallowlistasync.md)


</td><td>

`static`


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Adds an option to the allowlist.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[clearAllowlistAsync()](./playwright-browser-tunnel.launchoptionsvalidator.clearallowlistasync.md)


</td><td>

`static`


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Clears the entire allowlist.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getAllowlistDescription()](./playwright-browser-tunnel.launchoptionsvalidator.getallowlistdescription.md)


</td><td>

`static`


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Gets a human-readable description of the allowlist security model.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getAllowlistFilePath()](./playwright-browser-tunnel.launchoptionsvalidator.getallowlistfilepath.md)


</td><td>

`static`


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Gets the path to the allowlist file in the user's local preferences folder. This follows the pattern of playwright-browser-installed.txt but stores in user's home directory.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[readAllowlistAsync()](./playwright-browser-tunnel.launchoptionsvalidator.readallowlistasync.md)


</td><td>

`static`


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Reads the allowlist from the user's local file system. Returns an empty allowlist if the file doesn't exist or is invalid.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[removeFromAllowlistAsync(option)](./playwright-browser-tunnel.launchoptionsvalidator.removefromallowlistasync.md)


</td><td>

`static`


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Removes an option from the allowlist.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[validateLaunchOptionsAsync(launchOptions, terminal)](./playwright-browser-tunnel.launchoptionsvalidator.validatelaunchoptionsasync.md)


</td><td>

`static`


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Validates launch options against the security allowlist. All launch options are denied by default unless explicitly allowed by the user.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[writeAllowlistAsync(allowlist)](./playwright-browser-tunnel.launchoptionsvalidator.writeallowlistasync.md)


</td><td>

`static`


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Writes the allowlist to the user's local file system.


</td></tr>
